info.title: ProjectCRUD

get.description: Display a listing of the resource.

get.description: Show the form for creating a new resource.

get.summary: Show the form for editing the specified car

parameters.description: ID of the car to edit

get.summary: Download image of the specified car from storage

parameters.description: ID of the car to download image from

UpdateUserRequest.title: UpdateUserRequest
UpdateUserRequest.description: Request data for updating a user.

password.description: The new password of the user.

password_confirmation.description: The confirmation of the new password.

UpsertBorrowRequest.title: UpsertBorrowRequest
UpsertBorrowRequest.description: Request data for creating/updating a borrow.

make.description: The make of the car being borrowed.

model.description: The model of the car being borrowed.

body_shape.description: The body shape of the car being borrowed.

rental_date.description: The rental date for the car.

return_date.description: The return date for the car.

UpsertCarRequest.title: UpsertCarRequest
UpsertCarRequest.description: Request data for creating/updating a car.

body_shape.description: The body shape of the car.

fuel.description: The type of fuel used by the car.

transmission.description: The transmission type of the car.

engine.description: The engine type of the car.

engine_capacity.description: The engine capacity of the car.

day_repayment.description: The day repayment of the car.

rental_date.description: The rental date of the car.

return_date.description: The return date of the car.
